highlight.en: Thailand's elephant sanctuary capital with 50+ ethical sanctuaries in the surrounding jungle. Home to famous programs like Elephant Jungle Sanctuary and Elephant Dream Project, offering feeding, bathing, and overnight experiences from EUR21.
highlight.nl: De olifantenopvang-hoofdstad van Thailand met 50+ ethische opvangcentra in de omringende jungle. Thuisbasis van bekende programma's zoals Elephant Jungle Sanctuary en Elephant Dream Project, met voeren, baden en overnachtingservaringen vanaf EUR21.

highlight.en: Phuket offers diverse elephant sanctuary experiences from quick feeding sessions to full-day programs. Top sanctuaries include Elephant Jungle Sanctuary Phuket, Bukit Elephant Park, and Hidden Forest Elephant Reserve.
highlight.nl: Phuket biedt diverse olifantenopvang-ervaringen van snelle voedersessies tot volledige dagprogramma's. Topopvangcentra zijn Elephant Jungle Sanctuary Phuket, Bukit Elephant Park en Hidden Forest Elephant Reserve.

highlight.en: Krabi's elephant sanctuaries offer intimate, small-group experiences in the Ao Nang and Krabi Town area. From quick feeding programs to half-day ethical care experiences with waterfall visits.
highlight.nl: De olifantenopvangcentra van Krabi bieden intieme, kleine groepservaringen in het Ao Nang en Krabi Town gebied. Van snelle voederprogramma's tot halfdaagse ethische zorgervaringen met watervalbezoekencentra.
